Hi, I am Prabhakar. I am a senior at MIT majoring in Computer Science. I am interested in education technology, machine learning, and web. Besides, I like to take photos and hike when I have free time. If any of these excite you, I would love to connect and talk!!!

I am currently looking for full time jobs to start around July 2023. I am interested in data engineering and/or full stack development roles. So if you are hiring or have any leads on suitable opportunities, please reach out to me!!

This semester I am taking Operating Systems, Database Systems, Solid State Chemistry, and Intro to Photography and Related Media. Besides, I am also a lab assistant for Introduction to Machine Learning course.

I grew up in Biratnagar, Nepal and did my high school in Kathmandu. I am very much interested in working in some education related project in Nepal. If you are also interested and have some idea or would like to brainstorm together, feel free to reach out.

At MIT, I have been working as an undergraduate researcher for the last three years in various labs. Here are some of the research projects I have worked on. I am also currently the president of MITeri- Nepali student association at MIT.
